nodes.name: Python Script
nodes.pythonCode:
import clr
clr.AddReference('RevitAPI')
from Autodesk.Revit.DB import FilteredElementCollector, BuiltInCategory

# Get active document
doc = IN[0]

# Collect all rooms
rooms = FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Rooms).WhereElementIsNotElementType()

# Extract room names
room_names = [r.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.ROOM_NAME).AsString() for r in rooms]

OUT = room_names
